---
title: "Homework 8 Report"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2movies)
library(treemap)
library(MASS)

newdata<-ggplot2movies::movies
newdata["rating"]<-round(newdata["rating"])

newdata %>%
  group_by(rating, mpaa) %>%
  tally %>%
  ungroup -> mpaaratings
```

##Exercise 1

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r}
treemap(mpaaratings,
        index=c("mpaa"),
        vSize="n",
        vColor = "n",
        type="value")
```

```{r}
treemap(mpaaratings,
        index=c("rating"),
        vSize="n",
        vColor = "n",
        type="value")
```

```{r}
treemap(mpaaratings,
        index=c("rating", "mpaa"),
        vSize="n",
        vColor = "n",
        type="value")
```

```{r}
treemap(mpaaratings,
        index=c("mpaa", "rating"),
        vSize="n",
        vColor = "n",
        type="value")
```
